## AutocompleteResult.relatedItem property

An entity that corresponds to the autocomplete result.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
relatedItem?: Result;
```

## Remarks

This property is only defined if the corresponding [SearchParameterField.fetchEntities](./search-core.searchparameterfield.fetchentities.md) field is true.
